metadata.title: Foto4easy V Mount Battery Power Supply Plate V-Lock D-tap with 15mm Rod Clamp System for DSLR Camera Camcorder Monitor Video LED Light
features: WY-VG1 is a power supply system using V-mount batteries, with output over-voltage protection circuit, low static energy consumption, low temperature coefficient, high conversion efficiency, protection automatic lock and other functions.
With independent power switch, it can prevent power loss when you finish working and turn off the switch; with a power indicator, it is always red, indicating normal operation.
It provides DC15V, DC12V, DC8V and USB5V four types of output voltages to ensure power supply for almost all common devices on the market

.Multiple power outputs for difference device: DC 8V/3A with 5.5*2.1mm port for DSLR cameras,DC 12V/2A with 5.5*2.5mm port for Field monitor and video led light,DC 15V/2A with 5.5*2.5mm port for camcorder camera,D-tap 14.8V output for field monitor,evf,etc,also a USB 5A/2A output for smartphone,power bank,etc.
Compatible with V mount battery and 15mm rod clamp system. It is a practical and efficient multi-functional V-mount battery power supply system.
description: WY-VG1 is a power supply system using V-mount batteries, with output over-voltage protection circuit, low static energy consumption, low temperature coefficient, high conversion efficiency, protection automatic lock and other functions; with independent power switch, it can prevent power loss when you finish working and turn off the switch; with a power indicator, it is always red, indicating normal operation; It provides DC15V, DC12V, DC8V and USB5V four types of output voltages to ensure power supply for almost all common devices on the market, of which DC15V can supply power to the camcorders, and DC12V can supply power to the monitor, DC8V can supply power to DSLR cameras, and USB5V can power mobile phones, radio equipment, split screen and microphones, etc. Using the integrated 15mm LWS rod clamp, this battery plate can be mounted onto the rear of a shoulder rig. Having the device in this configuration allows you to use it and the battery as a counterweight for an otherwise front-heavy rig. It is a practical and efficient multi-functional V-mount battery power supply system.
